title: Wedding Headdress with en Tremble Diamante Settings

  techniques_name: forging (metal forming)

  object_colour: silver (color)

  physical_appearance: This is a silver headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The curved middle section is designed to fit the head
 with 21 arms of coiled wire springs attached to it. At the end of each wire
 there are dozens of diamonds arranged in a floral shape. There are several suspended diamonds hanging as pendants from these flowers. The wire coils are slightly rusty.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a silver headdress. It is decorated elaborately with dozens of diamonds. The curved middle section is designed to fit the head, with 21 arms of coiled wire springs attached to it. At the end of each wire, there are dozens of diamonds arranged in a floral shape. There are several suspended diamonds hanging as pendants from these flowers. The wire coils are slightly rusty.
